trans-unit.source: Change the role for a process step.

seg-source.mrk: Change the role for a process step.

trans-unit.source: A business user can be maintained in the <uicontrol>Manage User</uicontrol> section of the <uicontrol>Test Your Processes</uicontrol> app. A business user is required to execute a process step.

seg-source.mrk: A business user can be maintained in the <uicontrol>Manage User</uicontrol> section of the <uicontrol>Test Your Processes</uicontrol> app.
A business user is required to execute a process step.

target.mrk: 商業使用者角色可在 <uicontrol>[測試您的程序]</uicontrol> 應用程式的 <uicontrol>[管理使用者]</uicontrol> 區段中維護，
而商業使用者角色需要執行程序步驟。

trans-unit.source: In <uicontrol>Manage Your Test Processes</uicontrol>, each process step can have a different role. The role is linked to a business user. Therefore, if the <uicontrol>Role</uicontrol> field is left empty, a test process cannot be executed.

seg-source.mrk: In <uicontrol>Manage Your Test Processes</uicontrol>, each process step can have a different role.
The role is linked to a business user.
Therefore, if the <uicontrol>Role</uicontrol> field is left empty, a test process cannot be executed.

target.mrk: <uicontrol>[管理您的測試程序]</uicontrol> 中的每個程序步驟可有不同角色，
而該角色連結至商業使用者，
因此，若 <uicontrol>[角色]</uicontrol> 欄保留空白，則不可執行測試程序。

trans-unit.source: Use the value help to select a role. However, if you want to add a new role while editing the role, click <uicontrol>Create</uicontrol> in the <uicontrol>Select Role</uicontrol> window. A new window opens in the <uicontrol>Test Your Processes</uicontrol> app that allows you to add a new test user.

seg-source.mrk: Use the value help to select a role.
However, if you want to add a new role while editing the role, click <uicontrol>Create</uicontrol> in the <uicontrol>Select Role</uicontrol> window.
A new window opens in the <uicontrol>Test Your Processes</uicontrol> app that allows you to add a new test user.

target.mrk: 使用輸入輔助說明以選擇角色。
然而，若您在編輯角色時想新增角色，請按一下<uicontrol>[建立]</uicontrol> (在 <uicontrol>[選擇角色]</uicontrol> 視窗中)。
在 <uicontrol>[測試您的程序]</uicontrol> 應用程式開啟的新視窗，可讓您新增測試使用者。

trans-unit.source: When you create a new user, make sure that the new user is maintained with all required roles—including the roles needed to access the test tool (<userinput>SAP_BR_ADMIN_TEST_AUTOMATION </userinput>)—so that the user can execute a process step.

seg-source.mrk: When you create a new user, make sure that the new user is maintained with all required roles—including the roles needed to access the test tool (<userinput>SAP_BR_ADMIN_TEST_AUTOMATION </userinput>)—so that the user can execute a process step.

target.mrk: 當您建立新使用者時，確認新使用者以所有需要角色維護，包含需要存取測試工具的角色 (<userinput>SAP_BR_ADMIN_TEST_AUTOMATION </userinput>)，以便使用者可執行程序步驟。
